item.title: Daniel add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "If you want to identify me, ask me not where I live, or what I like to eat, or how I comb my hair, but ask me what I am living for, in detail, ask me what I think is keeping me from living fully for the thing I want to live for." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Francis Chan
item.description: "God's definition of what matters is pretty straightforward. He measures our lives by how we love." -- Francis Chan

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose" -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Itâ€™s not enough to have lived. We should be determined to live for something." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Gandhi
item.description: "Your beliefs become your thoughts, Your thoughts become your words, Your words become your actions, Your actions become your habits, Your habits become your values, Your values become your destiny." -- Gandhi

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive because your words become your behavior. Keep your behavior positive because your behavior becomes your habits. Keep your habits positive because your habits become your values. Keep your values positive because your values become your destiny." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "I am the sum total of everything that went before me, of all I have been seen done, of everything done-to-me. I am everyone everything whose being-in-the-world affected was affected by mine. I am anything that happens after I'm gone which would not have happened if I had not come." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything is determined, the beginning as well as the end, by forces over which we have no control. It is determined for the insect, as well as for the star. Human beings, vegetables, or cosmic dust, we all dance to a mysterious tune, intoned in the distance by an invisible piper." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "It really boils down to this: that all life is interrelated. We are all caught in an inescapable network of mutuality, tired into a single garment of destiny. Whatever affects one destiny, affects all indirectly." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Daniel add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Hardship often prepares an ordinary person for an extraordinary destiny." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Sow a thought and you reap an action; sow an act and you reap a habit; sow a habit and you reap a character; sow a character and you reap a destiny." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Abraham Verghese
item.description: "Not only our actions, but also our omissions, become our destiny." -- Abraham Verghese
